linked-list-predicates.name: Linked-List (Predicates)
linked-list-predicates.description: Inserting into an ordered linked-list which is specified via a recursively-defined predicate. The loop invariant uses a recursively-defined list segment predicate to bookkeep permissions.

linked-list-predicates-with-wands.name: Linked-List (Magic Wands)
linked-list-predicates-with-wands.description: A variant of the 'Linked-List (Predicates)' example, in which the loop invariant uses a magic wand to bookkeep permissions.

arraylist-quantified-permissions.name: Array-List (Quantified Permissions)
arraylist-quantified-permissions.description: Inserting into an array-list which is specified via quantified permissions (iterating separating conjunction).

encoding-adts.name: Encoding ADTs
encoding-adts.description: An encoding of a Haskell-style Nil-Cons-list, alongside proofs of certain properties of the encoded abstract data type, and a pattern match exhaustiveness check.

VMCAI'16.description: This webpage contains the full examples references in the paper "Viper: A Verification Infrastructure for Permission-Based Reasoning" published at VMCAI 2016. The experimental data used for the paper can be found by following this link.
